refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: g-euclid converts the specified object(s) from a BRL-CAD database.g file to the "decoded" EUCLID format. The decoded file represents each object as a series of polygonal faces. Each face may be one of either a simple face (no holes), a complex face (contains at least one hole), or a simple hole. This converter creates a region for each object ID number by unioning together all the objects with the same ID number. The -x option specifies an RT debug flag and the -X option specifies an NMG debug flag. The -a , -r , and -n options specify tessellation tolerances. The -o option specifies the name of the file to receive the output (stdout is the default).
